title: Temple of Midgaard
description: You stand in the grand Temple of Midgaard, a vast chamber bathed in the gentle glow of enchanted sconces affixed to towering marble columns. The air is thick with the scent of incense, a mix of sandalwood and myrrh that lingers long after it's burned. Red velvet carpets stretch across the polished stone floor, muffling your footsteps and guiding pilgrims toward a distant altar. Murals depicting ancient gods and forgotten battles cover the arched ceiling, their colors still vibrant despite the ages. A sense of peace and solemnity pervades the space, sheltering all who enter within its hallowed walls. Near the entrance stands a sturdy wooden donation box, carved with celestial runes, inviting offerings from the faithful.

north.description: An arched marble passage leads deeper into the sacred Inner Temple.

south.description: Wide sandstone steps descend into the bustling Midgaard Market Square.

east.description: A tiled hallway stretches east toward the official Midgaard Post Office.

west.description: A quiet stone corridor leads to the sanctum of the Cleric’s Guild.

extra_descriptions.description: A sturdy wooden box marked with glowing runes of charity and protection. It’s worn smooth from years of use, yet still radiates a faint divine warmth.
